main.java.networking

Class SudokuListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.java.networking.SudokuListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SudokuListener
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class is responsible for listening to the server, and in the eyes of the server, it's the player. It sends information only at the beginning, then only listens.
